promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a chibi young mythical beetle dark-type pokemon with violet hypnotic wings. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, dark or beetle. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptoviolet, a a chibi young mythical beetle dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: Dark Hole, Baleful Night. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "beetle", "dark" or "Cryptoviolet". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, beetle-like, mythical, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Hailing from shadow-hewn tombs, Cryptoviolet is enshrouded in mystery. With its Baleful Night, it ensnares prey in inky depths unseen.
